mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, ADMIN_PUBLIC ) VALUES ( #{rsrvSeq}, #{bbsTitle}, #{bbsContent}, 0, SYSDATE, #{bbsStar}, #{bbsPublic}, 'Y' )
INSERT INTO REVIEW_PHT ( RSRV_SEQ, PHT_NUM, PHT_NAME, PHT_ORG_NAME, PHT_SIZE, PHT_EXT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{rsrvSeq}, #{phtNum}, #{phtName}, #{phtOrgName}, #{phtSize}, #{phtExt}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY SET PAY_STEP = '400' WHERE RSRV_SEQ = #{rsrvSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.RSRV_SEQ) CNT FROM REVIEW A, RSRV B, CAFE C WHERE A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ AND B.CAFE_NUM = C.CAFE_NUM AND A.ADMIN_PUBLIC = 'Y'
AND C.CAFE_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, USER_ID, CAFE_NUM, CAFE_NAME, PHT_NUM, PHT_NAME, ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, USER_ID, CAFE_NUM, CAFE_NAME, PHT_NUM, PHT_NAME, ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM (SELECT A.RSRV_SEQ AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_STAR, 0.0) AS BBS_STAR, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, 'N') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.CAFE_NUM, '') AS CAFE_NUM, NVL(C.CAFE_NAME, '') AS CAFE_NAME, D.PHT_NUM AS PHT_NUM, NVL(D.PHT_NAME, '') AS PHT_NAME, NVL(A.ADMIN_PUBLIC, '') AS ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM REVIEW A, RSRV B, CAFE C, (SELECT RSRV_SEQ, PHT_NAME, PHT_NUM FROM REVIEW_PHT WHERE PHT_NUM = 1) D WHERE A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ AND B.CAFE_NUM = C.CAFE_NUM AND A.RSRV_SEQ = D.RSRV_SEQ(+) AND A.ADMIN_PUBLIC = 'Y'
AND C.CAFE_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, USER_ID, CAFE_NUM, USER_GENDER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, USER_ID, CAFE_NUM, USER_GENDER FROM (SELECT A.RSRV_SEQ AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_STAR, 0.0) AS BBS_STAR, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, 'N') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.CAFE_NUM, '') AS CAFE_NUM, NVL(C.USER_GENDER, '') AS USER_GENDER FROM REVIEW A, RSRV B, TBL_USER C WHERE B.CAFE_NUM = #{value} AND A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 3

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, USER_ID, CAFE_NUM, USER_GENDER FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_STAR, BBS_PUBLIC, USER_ID, CAFE_NUM, USER_GENDER FROM (SELECT A.RSRV_SEQ AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_STAR, 0.0) AS BBS_STAR, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, 'N') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.CAFE_NUM, '') AS CAFE_NUM, NVL(C.USER_GENDER, '') AS USER_GENDER FROM REVIEW A, RSRV B, TBL_USER C WHERE B.CAFE_NUM = #{value} AND A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM = 1

SELECT A.RSRV_SEQ AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_STAR, 0.0) AS BBS_STAR, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, 'N') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.CAFE_NUM, '') AS CAFE_NUM, NVL(C.CAFE_NAME, '') AS CAFE_NAME, NVL(A.ADMIN_PUBLIC, '') AS ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM REVIEW A, RSRV B, CAFE C WHERE A.RSRV_SEQ = #{value} AND A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ AND B.CAFE_NUM = C.CAFE_NUM AND A.ADMIN_PUBLIC = 'Y' s

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, PHT_NUM, NVL(PHT_NAME, '') AS PHT_NAME, NVL(PHT_ORG_NAME, '') AS PHT_ORG_NAME, NVL(PHT_SIZE, 0) AS PHT_SIZE, NVL(PHT_EXT, '') AS PHT_EXT, REG_DATE FROM REVIEW_PHT WHERE RSRV_SEQ = #{value} AND PHT_NUM = 1

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, PHT_NUM, NVL(PHT_NAME, '') AS PHT_NAME, NVL(PHT_ORG_NAME, '') AS PHT_ORG_NAME, NVL(PHT_SIZE, 0) AS PHT_SIZE, NVL(PHT_EXT, '') AS PHT_EXT, REG_DATE FROM REVIEW_PHT WHERE RSRV_SEQ = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET BBS_TITLE = #{bbsTitle}, BBS_CONTENT = #{bbsContent}, BBS_STAR = #{bbsStar}, BBS_PUBLIC = #{bbsPublic} WHERE RSRV_SEQ = #{rsrvSeq}
